headline.print_headline: Asia Stages Improbable EurAsia Cup Comeback
headline.main: Asia Stages Improbable EurAsia Cup Comeback

docs.snippet: Asia staged an improbable Ryder Cup-like comeback on the final day of the EurAsia Cup on Saturday, picking up seven of 10 points available in singles to level the score at 10-all and share the trophy with Europe....
docs.lead_paragraph: Asia staged an improbable Ryder Cup-like comeback on the final day of the EurAsia Cup on Saturday, picking up seven of 10 points available in singles to level the score at 10-all and share the trophy with Europe.

headline.print_headline: Knicks Are Dealt a Rout by the Suns and a Blow to Their Playoff Hopes
headline.main: Knicks Are Dealt a Rout by the Suns and a Blow to Their Playoff Hopes

docs.snippet: The Knicks could have pulled within a game of Atlanta for the final playoff spot in the Eastern Conference but had another lackluster defensive showing....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Knicks could have pulled within a game of Atlanta for the final playoff spot in the Eastern Conference but had another lackluster defensive showing.

docs.snippet: Michael Chiklis is ready to freak out....
docs.lead_paragraph: Michael Chiklis is ready to freak out.

headline.print_headline: Dodgers Top Angels After Teams Play Through 'Quake
headline.main: Dodgers Top Angels After Teams Play Through 'Quake

docs.snippet: Playing through an earthquake that was felt in the ballpark, the Los Angeles Dodgers beat the Angels 5-4 in 10 innings Friday night after rookie Joc Pederson hit a tying home run in the eighth....
docs.lead_paragraph: Playing through an earthquake that was felt in the ballpark, the Los Angeles Dodgers beat the Angels 5-4 in 10 innings Friday night after rookie Joc Pederson hit a tying home run in the eighth.

headline.print_headline: Mercedes' Hamilton Takes Pole at Malaysian GP
headline.main: Mercedes' Hamilton Takes Pole at Malaysian GP

docs.snippet: Mercedes driver Lewis Hamilton took pole position for the Malaysian Grand Prix on Saturday to tie the record for most qualifying wins by a British driver in Formula One....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mercedes driver Lewis Hamilton took pole position for the Malaysian Grand Prix on Saturday to tie the record for most qualifying wins by a British driver in Formula One.

headline.print_headline: Thai Protesters Rally Against PM Ahead of Senate Vote
headline.main: Thai Protesters Rally Against PM Ahead of Senate Vote

docs.snippet: Tens of thousands of Thai anti-government protesters rallied across Bangkok on Saturday in their latest bid to topple Prime Minister Yingluck Shinawatra, a day before a crucial vote to elect a new Senate....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tens of thousands of Thai anti-government protesters rallied across Bangkok on Saturday in their latest bid to topple Prime Minister Yingluck Shinawatra, a day before a crucial vote to elect a new Senate.

headline.print_headline: Rockies' Chatwood Leaves Start With Leg Injury
headline.main: Rockies' Chatwood Leaves Start With Leg Injury

docs.snippet: Colorado Rockies starter Tyler Chatwood was injured running out a triple Friday night in a 3-2 loss to the Seattle Mariners....
docs.lead_paragraph: Colorado Rockies starter Tyler Chatwood was injured running out a triple Friday night in a 3-2 loss to the Seattle Mariners.

headline.print_headline: Thousands March in Thai Capital Against Government
headline.main: Thousands March in Thai Capital Against Government

docs.snippet: Tens of thousands of anti-government protesters marched through the streets of Thailand's capital Saturday, reviving their whistle-blowing, traffic-blocking campaign to try to force the resignation of the country's prime minister....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tens of thousands of anti-government protesters marched through the streets of Thailand's capital Saturday, reviving their whistle-blowing, traffic-blocking campaign to try to force the resignation of the country's prime minister.

headline.main: UN Panel: 8 Reasons to Worry About Global Warming

headline.print_headline: Once Again, Izzo Is One Step Away
headline.main: With Win Over Virginia, Michigan State’s Izzo Is Again One Step Away

docs.snippet: Every one of Tom Izzo’s senior classes at Michigan State has reached at least one Final Four. With the Spartans’ razor-thin victory over Virginia, this year’s group has a shot....
docs.abstract: Michigan State defeats Virginia, 61-59, in the NCAA men's basketball tournament Round of 16.
docs.lead_paragraph: Every one of Tom Izzo’s senior classes at Michigan State has reached at least one Final Four. With the Spartans’ razor-thin victory over Virginia, this year’s group has a shot.
